languages.text: {n}Сенешаль тяжело вздыхает и, кажется, на глазах стареет еще на десяток лет.{/n} "Что ж, {name}. Я отдам все необходимые распоряжения о высадке. Был рад знакомству с вами. Прощайте".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сенешаль тяжело вздыхает и, кажется, на глазах стареет еще на десяток лет.{/n} "Что ж, {name}. Я отдам все необходимые распоряжения о высадке. Был рад знакомству с вами. Прощайте".

languages.text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль тяжело вздыхает и, кажется, на глазах стареет еще на десяток лет.{/n} "Что ж, {name}. Я отдам все необходимые распоряжения о высадке. Был рад знакомству с вами. Прощайте".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

{n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

{n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

{n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德重重地叹了口气，似乎突然就在你眼前老了十岁。{/n}“好吧，{name}，我会负责传达所有关于登陆的必要指示。很高兴认识你，我们就此别过吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德重重地叹了口气，似乎突然就在你眼前老了十岁。{/n}“好吧，{name}，我会负责传达所有关于登陆的必要指示。很高兴认识你，我们就此别过吧。”

languages.text: {n}アベラードは眼前で、まるでさらに10歳は老け込むかのような重々しいため息をついた。{/n}「よろしいでしょう、{name}。着陸に必要なすべての指示をお伝えいたします。お会いできて光栄でした。さようなら」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラードは眼前で、まるでさらに10歳は老け込むかのような重々しいため息をついた。{/n}「よろしいでしょう、{name}。着陸に必要なすべての指示をお伝えいたします。お会いできて光栄でした。さようなら」

languages.text: {n}Abelard seufzt laut und scheint vor deinen Augen um zehn Jahre zu altern.{/n} "Also gut, {name}. Ich werde die erforderlichen Anweisungen für die Landung weitergeben. Es hat mich gefreut, Euch kennenzulernen. Lebt wohl."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard seufzt laut und scheint vor deinen Augen um zehn Jahre zu altern.{/n} "Also gut, {name}. Ich werde die erforderlichen Anweisungen für die Landung weitergeben. Es hat mich gefreut, Euch kennenzulernen. Lebt wohl."

languages.text: {n}Abélard pousse un long soupir et semble vieillir de dix ans en l'espace de quelques secondes.{/n} « Très bien, {name}. Je vais transmettre les instructions nécessaires pour le débarquement. Ce fut un plaisir de vous connaître. Adieu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard pousse un long soupir et semble vieillir de dix ans en l'espace de quelques secondes.{/n} « Très bien, {name}. Je vais transmettre les instructions nécessaires pour le débarquement. Ce fut un plaisir de vous connaître. Adieu. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard suspira profundamente y parece envejecer otros diez años en un instante.{/n} «Entendido, {name}. Daré todas las instrucciones pertinentes para el aterrizaje. Ha sido un placer conocerl{mf|e|a}. Adiós».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard suspira profundamente y parece envejecer otros diez años en un instante.{/n} «Entendido, {name}. Daré todas las instrucciones pertinentes para el aterrizaje. Ha sido un placer conocerl{mf|e|a}. Adiós».

languages.text: {n}Abelard derin bir iç çekip sanki gözünün önünde bir on yıl daha yaşlanıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. İniş için gerekli tüm talimatları ileteceğim. Sizi tanımak zevkti. Elveda."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs heavily and seems to age another ten years before your eyes.{/n} "Very well, {name}. I shall relay all the necessary instructions for the landing. It was a pleasure to know you. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard derin bir iç çekip sanki gözünün önünde bir on yıl daha yaşlanıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. İniş için gerekli tüm talimatları ileteceğim. Sizi tanımak zevkti. Elveda."
